# Development Documentation

This directory contains development notes and improvement tracking documents created during the project's evolution.

## Contents

### Project Analysis Documents
- **PROJECT_ANALYSIS.md** - Initial comprehensive codebase analysis
- **PROJECT_GRADE.md** - Code quality assessment and grading
- **DETAILED_ANALYSIS.md** - In-depth technical analysis of Q-file handling

### Improvement Tracking
- **REMAINING_IMPROVEMENTS.md** - List of identified issues and enhancement opportunities
- **IMPROVEMENTS_SUMMARY.md** - Summary of completed improvements
- **IMPROVEMENTS.md** - General improvement notes

### Migration Guides
- **PYTHON37_MIGRATION.md** - Notes on Python 3.7 compatibility work
- **IMPORT_PATTERN_SOLUTION.md** - Documentation of import pattern refactoring
- **CONFIGURABLE_LOGGING_FIX.md** - Logging configuration improvements

## Primary Documentation

For current project documentation, see:
- **README.md** (root) - User-facing documentation and quick start
- **CONTRIBUTING.md** (root) - Contributor guidelines
- **CHANGELOG.md** (root) - Version history and changes
- **CLAUDE.md** (root) - AI assistant guidance for codebase

## Development Workflow

See the main [CONTRIBUTING.md](../../CONTRIBUTING.md) for:
- Setting up development environment
- Running tests and linters
- Submitting pull requests
- Code style guidelines
